Redesign and reconstruct Boylston Street from Ipswich Street south to Park Drive and the Muddy River Crossing. Build protected bike lanes, a mid-block crossing, upgraded signals, replacement lighting and new sidewalks in certain locations.
Design and construct Neighborhood Slow Street zones throughout the City.
Lighting, paving, re-striping, and other upgrades to municipal parking lots Citywide.

Construct the Arboretum Gateway Path, which will create new entrances to the Arnold Arboretum and extend the Blackwell path south to Roslindale Square. The first phase includes a new entrance at the end of Arboretum Road.
Design for traffic flow and safety improvements in Eagle Square.
Design and construct safety improvements to various traffic signals throughout the City.
Transform several corridors Citywide for rapid bus transit, including the construction of dedicated bus lanes on Summer Street, Columbus Avenue and Warren Street.
Create conceptual designs for key projects identified from planning studies and action plans.
Study to determine facility needs for the Jackson/Mann School and community center.
Various sidewalk and pedestrian ramp repairs and reconstruction.
Renovate building to improve envelope (roof, new windows, masonry repair) and upgrade interior.
